artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Orange & yellow warp. White, drk & lt tan, bronze metallic weft forms bands. Plain or twill weave variation. Mount labeled Pomegranite, H.W." and H-8A (orange, yellow, tan, white, brown, bronze metallic)

title: Pomegranate
